synopsis.text: Cross and Chaos, two notorious alien invaders, have set their sights on Earth, intending to plunder its resources and leave destruction in their wake. Standing between them and their sinister goal are the Iczelions, powerful warriors formed by the fusion of young girls and sentient robotic armor. Nagisa, a high school girl with dreams of becoming a professional wrestler, finds herself thrust into this intergalactic conflict when she is chosen to become an Iczelion. Despite her initial reluctance and timid nature, Nagisa must rise to the challenge and embrace her new role as Earth's defender, all while clinging to her dreams and the normal life she once knew. Can Nagisa and her fellow Iczelions protect their world from these formidable invaders? The fate of the planet rests in their hands.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
